column2: For Freight departures from Hoo Junction in the updirection
column3: Hoo Junction signal NK512 to be used (TIPLOC HOJ512)

column2: For Freight departures from Hoo Junction in thedown direction
column3: Hoo Junction signal NK511 to be used(HOOJS11)

column2: For freight departures from Hoo Junction towardsthe Grain Branch
column3: Cliffe signal NK509 to be used(CLFFD12)

column2: For freight arrivals at Hoo Junction from the GrainBranch
column3: The TIPLOC (HOOJ) must be used and CLFFD12 mustnot be used

column1: Propelling movements from Tonbridgetowards Tonbridge West Yard
ECS trains from Down Main Signal NK1630 running beyond Strood towards Gravesend are required to stand inplatforms 2 or 3 for 1 minute to ensure correct operation of ARS
